alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 8:47AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Hempstead and Miller Counties, northwestern Caddo Parish, Marion, Cass, northern Harrison, southeastern Bowie and south central Gregg Counties through 930 AM CDT... At 847 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Maud to near Harleton. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Marshall, Atlanta, Wake Village, Vivian, Hallsville, Nash, Jefferson, Linden, Queen City, Redwater, Fouke, Rodessa, Ida, Fulton, Bivins, Mandeville, Lodi, Smithland and Ravanna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas.
